name: beat-domain
description:
You can Alt + Enter to enter Fullscreen Mode

HOW TO PLAY

  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space / Mouse Click - Dash
  • Dodge bullets and survive against the rhythm boss till the song ends!

NOTE: The wrong version of Windows Build has been uploaded but due to the rules, I won't be able to update the link until the Jam ends. Sorry for the inconvenience caused. MAC and Linux is the latest build

Submission for VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity]

beat-domain is a rhythm bullet hell dodging game made over 4 days over 2 weekends. Be on edge as Murasaki survives against the ruthless waves of rhythmic attacks by the cursed spirit, Yuki.  Careful of touching the edges of the stage!

All art and music are original and created for this jam. Made in Unity Engine 2020
